website_summaries.verdict: Versatile mid-cut women's basketball shoe. Designed for comfort. durability and protection but with subtle fashion-forward texture and patterns.
pros: Good all-around shoe, mid-cut offers greater flexibility, more range of movement for on court use
cons: Traction and grip may be less than desirable

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I'm a hip hop dancer and teacher, and I wore these last night for the first time (4 classes) and again this morning (2 classes). They are comfy, fit well, look great, and are great for dancing because they don't have a ton of traction like running shoes. I don't lace the upper lace holes because I like them a little looser on my ankles (same with my Converse). While I love my Converse, these have a more supportive insole. Glad I got them!
customer_reviews.author: Lance Uppercut

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, design and price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe for my teenage little sister for school. She loves it. It is true to size. And there is a visible design above the ankle area which is a hard fabric like material. I do not anticipate it to be difficult to clean. The quality is as expected and you won't be disappointed. Very comfortable. Another great shoe from Adidas!
customer_reviews.author: Kellsie

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pair!!
customer_reviews.text: My very favorite sneakers. I have purchased 2 pairs in one yest because i like them that much. They’re originals. Comes in the box. I’m a size 6 and fits perfectly, true to the size. White never goes wrong. Extremely comfortable and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Sa

customer_reviews.title: These are not real basketball shoes.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe has a flat innersole. No arch support, no cushioning. Not a basketball shoe. Very disappointed that Adidas does not make real basketball shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy A

customer_reviews.title: nice sports shoes
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is happy with these sneakers, the perfect fit and arrived in record time, recommended seller 100%!
customer_reviews.author: Augusto Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow - abrasive material in the ankle area
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of these shoes but had to return them because not only they were to narrow (even for standard-wide feet) but the material they used for the ankle area is too abrasive. I had them on for 5 minutes and were so unconfortable that I had to take them off.
customer_reviews.author: 305friend

customer_reviews.title: Switch it up
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box comfortable. Looks just like the picture. I wore them all day in the office. We wear casual attire. I usually buy Jordan’s but these were a nice change.
customer_reviews.author: GeeMee

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is a good fit but a little wide
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is a good fit but a little wide. Its not to the point of disappointment. However, my right shoe have a little dirt/discoloration to the upper back area which is the satin like material. Its not extremely noticeable but its just the point.
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha M

customer_reviews.title: Wish they fit
customer_reviews.text: Love these, but they run large, and my size was sold out.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Guy that bought girl shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I am a guy and bought them. They fit good and look nice. No complaints. I wear 9. Bought 11 in girls.
customer_reviews.author: jerry steel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: They were so very comfortable and since I’m on my feet all day they were a big help
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Howard

customer_reviews.title: Sge said she had to let the laces a bit lose to make them fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my wife, she found them a little but to tight wideside. Sge said she had to let the laces a bit lose to make them fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's better than expected, great price. I have been getting lots of compliments about how nice is it.
customer_reviews.author: Andreia

customer_reviews.title: My BOMB Adidas hightops!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with the shoes I chose!! They are exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: I loved how clean they are and how durable they are. I will be buying another pair when summer comes again.
customer_reviews.author: Lorene Johnson

customer_reviews.title: They look great and fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my daughter. They look great and fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: A. D.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Adidas are great shoes. These are stylish and comfortable at the same time of course which is awesome. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Plummer

customer_reviews.title: They are really cool, a little big for my size but look ...
customer_reviews.text: They are really cool, a little big for my size but look nice and feel comfortable, arrived in record time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gómez

customer_reviews.title: She like the style and color of ghee shoes
customer_reviews.text: I brought these shoes for my daughter. She like the style and color of ghee shoes. I like that they still have a feminine touch to them.
customer_reviews.author: Zita Hall

customer_reviews.title: adidas  shoes
customer_reviews.text: the shoes are really comfty but they make a noise when u walk is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Stefania

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice, my girl is 8 I had to returned and the 7 fit really good
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved the shoe but it was too small so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Feel great! And fun to wear when I teach dance class!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fact that they where as the pictures perceived. They fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: annie goulart

customer_reviews.title: An ok shoe if it's on sale!
customer_reviews.text: These are a *little* narrow in the forefoot. They hurt at first, but then I loosened up the laces, and they were ok—fine for all day at work (not on my feet), but I wouldn't want to be on my feet all day in them. They are also very clearly the lower-end Adidas product. Buuuuut I got them during Prime Day at a steep discount—and they're well worth the $25 I paid for them. I look cool when I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Sunday Socks

customer_reviews.title: Classic look
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Have a classic look to them, never goes out of style
customer_reviews.author: SoMel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are very comfortable and go with almost every outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Double SS

product_meta.title: adidas Women's VS Hoops Mid 2.0 W
product_meta.description: You'll be super stylish when you sport the adidas® VS Hoops Mid 2.0 sneakers. Combination textile and synthetic upper. Mid-top design. Traditional lace-up closure. Padded tongue and collar. Breathable fabric lining. Cushioned foam insole for superior comfort. Durable rubber outsole. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 14 oz Product measurements were taken using size 9.5, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
